column4: How does I save this script? http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-255924.html
copy and paste it into a text editor
it doesn't matter, linux doesn't care about that stuff
It's stays so in the script
put it in /usr/local/bin/.  You'll need sudo.  Do you know how to do that?
what is the current path to the file?
I made it copy, not move.  So it should be there.  Now make it executable with 'sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/shot'
you said it was called "shot", not "shoot"
